name: Dr. Sarah Chen
title: Chief Executive Officer
bio: Dr. Chen brings over 15 years of experience in electric vehicle technology and sustainable energy solutions. She holds a PhD in Electrical Engineering from MIT and has led multiple successful EV startups.

name: Michael Rodriguez
title: Chief Technology Officer
bio: Michael is a visionary technologist with expertise in battery systems, power electronics, and autonomous vehicle technology. He has filed over 20 patents in EV technology.

name: Jennifer Park
title: Chief Operating Officer
bio: Jennifer oversees all operational aspects of Enertrics Power, from manufacturing to supply chain management. She has successfully scaled multiple manufacturing operations.

name: David Wilson
title: Head of Research & Development
bio: David leads our R&D efforts, focusing on next-generation battery technology and advanced EV systems. He has published over 50 peer-reviewed papers in energy storage.

name: Lisa Thompson
title: Head of Manufacturing
bio: Lisa manages our state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities, ensuring quality, efficiency, and sustainability in all production processes.

name: Dr. Robert Kim
title: Senior Battery Engineer
bio: Dr. Kim specializes in lithium-ion battery design and thermal management systems. He has developed several breakthrough battery technologies.

name: Alex Johnson
title: Head of Sales & Marketing
bio: Alex leads our sales and marketing efforts, building partnerships with major automakers and expanding our market presence globally.

name: Kumar Gambhir
title: HR Manager
bio: Maria ensures that all our operations and products meet the highest environmental standards, driving our commitment to sustainable practices.
